articles.description: Dortmund have parted ways with Favre after a humiliating home defeat to newly-promoted VfB Stuttgart on Saturday left them fifth in the Bundesliga
articles.content:
Borussia Dortmund have parted ways with manager Lucien Favre after they were thrashed 5-1 at home by VfB Stuttgart, according to a report from Germany.
Favre was appointed Dortmund boss in May 2018 … [+1478 chars]
